turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a coffee to a pick up from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok order coffee from starbucks for pick up is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Highway 183 and Central Drive in Bedford.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok Highway 183 at Central Drive, Bedford is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok what kind of coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like a caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok cafe americano got it, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Short, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: short, got it, what type of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2%, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2% milk, got it, any additional flavoring for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A dab of whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a dab of whipped cream, got it. let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 1 cafe americano, short with 2% milk and a dab of whipped cream from starbucks is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me find the store closes to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have a starbucks at 2104 Airport Freeway is that store ok for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. The Highway 183 and Central Drive in Bedford, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok sorry my mistake, let me try again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have a starbuck at Hwy 183 & Central Dr is that ok for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly. your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
